title: After Hours
author: The Weeknd
lyrics:
[00:11.49] Thought I almost died in my dream again (baby, almost died)

[00:42.49]

[01:00.73] 
[01:01.46] I wanna share babies

[01:09.86] Your body next to me

[01:34.66]

[01:51.17] 
[02:29.93] My darkest hours

[02:40.77] I turned into the man I used to be, to be
[02:46.09]

[03:04.04]

[03:07.24] Where are you now when I need you most?

[03:21.53]

[03:33.60] Spendin' money to compensate, compensate
[03:38.96]

[03:51.36] I'll never let you down again, again
[03:56.96]

[03:60.00] Where are you now when I need you most?
[04:04.12] I'd give it all just to hold you close

[04:26.49] This time I won't break your heart, your heart, yeah
[04:32.64]

[04:56.93] Then said you were wrong for me
[04:59.45] I lied to you, I lied to you, I lied to you (to you)
[05:03.56] Can't hide the truth, I stayed with her in spite of you
[05:08.00] You did some things that you regret, still ride for you
[05:12.49] 'Cause this house is not a home
[05:15.88]
